author: Ben White
title: Trump’s economic record disintegrates in a month
description: In just weeks, the president’s challenge has morphed from building on his predecessor’s economic record to rebuilding his own.
content: The impact of his chief legislative achievement a big tax-cut bill heavily focused on corporations is now moot after mostly delivering stock buybacks and dividend payments rather than a boom in corporate investment. Perhaps the big increase in corporate inves… [+7442 chars]
